verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, I want more of You Living Water, rain down on me. Oh, I need more of You Living Breath of life come and fill me up.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are hungry, we are hungry We are hungry for more of You We are thirsty, O Jesus We are thirsty for more of You (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We lift our holy hands up We want to touch You We lift our voices higher, And higher, and higher to You.{/lang-eng}
